   19: %%
   20: -module(dbg_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Test functions
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   24:          big/1, tiny/1, simple/1, message/1, distributed/1, port/1,
   25: 	 send/1, recv/1,
   26:          ip_port/1, file_port/1, file_port2/1, file_tracer/1,
   27:          ip_port_busy/1, wrap_port/1, wrap_port_time/1,
   28:          with_seq_trace/1, dead_suspend/1, local_trace/1,
   29:          saved_patterns/1, tracer_exit_on_stop/1,
   30:          erl_tracer/1, distributed_erl_tracer/1]).
   31: -export([tracee1/1, tracee2/1]).
   32: -export([dummy/0, exported/1]).
   33: -export([enabled/3, trace/5, load_nif/1]).
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   39:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   40: 
   41: all() -> 
   42:     [big, tiny, simple, message, distributed, port, ip_port,
   43:      send, recv,
   44:      file_port, file_port2, file_tracer, ip_port_busy,
   45:      wrap_port, wrap_port_time, with_seq_trace, dead_suspend,
   46:      local_trace, saved_patterns, tracer_exit_on_stop,
   47:      erl_tracer, distributed_erl_tracer].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   53:     dbg:stop(),
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: %% Rudimentary interface test
   57: big(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   58:     {ok,OldCurDir} = file:get_cwd(),
   59:     Datadir=proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   60:     Privdir=proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   61:     ok=file:set_cwd(Privdir),
   62:     try
   63:         %% make sure dbg is stopped (and returns correctly)
   64:         ok = dbg:stop(),
   65: 
   66:         %% compile test module and make sure it is loaded.
   67:         {ok,Mod} = compile:file(Datadir++"/dbg_test",[trace]),
   68:         code:purge(dbg_test),
   69:         {module, Mod}=code:load_file(dbg_test),
   70: 
   71:         %% run/debug a named test function.
   72:         Pid = spawn_link(dbg_test, loop, [Config]),
   73:         true = register(dbg_test_loop, Pid),
   74:         {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(),
   75:         {ok,[{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(dbg_test_loop, [m,p,c]),
   76:         ok = dbg:c(dbg_test, test, [Config]),
   77:         ok = dbg:i(),
   78:         dbg_test_loop ! {dbg_test, stop},
   79:         unregister(dbg_test_loop),
   80:         ok = dbg:stop(),
   81: 
   82:         %% run/debug a Pid.
   83:         Pid2=spawn_link(dbg_test,loop,[Config]),
   84:         {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(),
   85:         {ok,[{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(Pid2,[s,r,p]),
   86:         ok = dbg:c(dbg_test, test, [Config]),
   87:         ok = dbg:i(),
   88:         Pid2 ! {dbg_test, stop},
   89: 
   90:         ok=file:set_cwd(OldCurDir)
   91:     after
   92:         dbg:stop()
   93:     end,
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: 
   97: %% Rudimentary interface test
   98: tiny(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     {ok,OldCurDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  100:     Datadir=proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  101:     Privdir=proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  102:     ok=file:set_cwd(Privdir),
  103:     try
  104:         %% compile test module and make sure it is loaded.
  105:         {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Datadir++"/dbg_test",[trace]),
  106:         code:purge(dbg_test),
  107:         {module, Mod}=code:load_file(dbg_test),
  108: 
  109:         Pid=spawn_link(dbg_test,loop,[Config]),
  110:         if
  111:             is_pid(Pid) ->
  112:                 dbg:tracer(),
  113:                 {ok,[{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(Pid,[s,r,m,p,c]),
  114:                 ok = dbg:c(dbg_test,test,[Config]),
  115:                 ok = dbg:i(),
  116:                 Pid ! {dbg_test, stop};
  117:             true ->
  118:                 ok=file:set_cwd(OldCurDir),
  119:                 ct:fail("Could not spawn external test process.~n"),
  120:                 failure
  121:         end
  122:     after
  123:         dbg:stop(),
  124:         ok = file:set_cwd(OldCurDir)
  125:     end,
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: %% Simple interface test with own handler
  129: simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     try
  131:         start(),
  132:         dbg:p(self(),call),
  133:         dbg:tp(dbg,ltp,[]),
  134:         dbg:ltp(),
  135:         stop(),
  136:         S = self(),
  137:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]}}] = flush()
  138:     after
  139:         dbg:stop()
  140:     end,
  141:     ok.
  142: 
  143: %% Simple interface test with pam code that appends a message
  144: message(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  145:     {ok, _} = start(),
  146:     try
  147:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  148:         {ok, X} = dbg:tp(dbg,ltp,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  149:         {value, {saved, Saved}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  150:         {ok, Y} = dbg:tp(dbg,ln,Saved),
  151:         {value, {saved, Saved}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, Y),
  152:         ok = dbg:ltp(),
  153:         ok = dbg:ln()
  154:     after
  155:         dbg:stop()
  156:     end,
  157:     S = self(),
  158:     [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]},S},
  159:      {trace,S,call,{dbg,ln,[]},S}] = flush(),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     {ok, _} = start(),
  164:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  165:     rpc:call(Node, code, add_patha,
  166:              [filename:dirname(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config))]),
  167:     try
  168:         Echo = fun F() ->
  169:                        receive {From, M} ->
  170:                                From ! M,
  171:                                F()
  172:                        end
  173:                end,
  174: 	Rcvr = spawn_link(Echo),
  175:         RemoteRcvr = spawn(Node, Echo),
  176: 
  177: 	{ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(Rcvr, send),
  178: 
  179:         send_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), true),
  180: 
  181:         %% Test that the test case process is the receiving process
  182:         send_test(Rcvr, [{[self(),'_'],[],[]}]),
  183: 
  184:         %% Test that self() is not the receiving process
  185:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}, {saved, 2}]} =
  186:             dbg:tpe(send, [{['$1','_'],[{'==','$1',{self}}],[]}]),
  187:         send_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), false),
  188: 
  189:         %% Test that self() is the sending process
  190:         send_test(Rcvr, [{['_','_'],[{'==',Rcvr,{self}}],[]}]),
  191: 
  192:         %% Test attaching a message
  193:         send_test(Rcvr, [{['_','_'],[{'==',Rcvr,{self}}],[{message, hello}]}],
  194:                   make_ref(), hello),
  195: 
  196:         %% Test using a saved trace pattern
  197:         send_test(Rcvr, 2, make_ref(), false),
  198: 
  199:         %% Test clearing of trace pattern
  200:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:ctpe(send),
  201:         send_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), true),
  202: 
  203:         %% Test complex message inspection
  204:         Ref = make_ref(),
  205:         send_test(Rcvr,
  206:                   [{['_','$2'],[{'==',Ref,{element,1,{element,2,'$2'}}}],[]}],
  207:                   {test, {Ref}, <<0:(8*1024)>>}, true),
  208: 
  209:         send_test(Rcvr, {test, {make_ref()}, <<0:(8*1024)>>}, false),
  210: 
  211:         %% Test send to remote process
  212:         remote_send_test(Rcvr, RemoteRcvr, [], make_ref(), true),
  213: 
  214:         remote_send_test(Rcvr, RemoteRcvr,
  215:                          [{['$1','_'],[{'==',{node, '$1'},{node}}],[]}],
  216:                          make_ref(), false),
  217: 
  218:         remote_send_test(Rcvr, RemoteRcvr,
  219:                          [{['$1','_'],[{'==',{node, '$1'},Node}],[]}],
  220:                          make_ref(), true),
  221: 
  222:         %% Test that distributed dbg works
  223:         dbg:tracer(Node, process, {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  224:         Rcvr2 = spawn_link(Echo),
  225:         RemoteRcvr2 = spawn(Node, Echo),
  226:         dbg:p(Rcvr2, [send]),
  227:         dbg:p(RemoteRcvr2, [send]),
  228:         dbg:tpe(send, [{['_', hej],[],[]}]),
  229: 
  230:         send_test(Rcvr2, make_ref(), false),
  231:         send_test(RemoteRcvr2, make_ref(), false),
  232:         send_test(Rcvr2, hej, true),
  233:         send_test(RemoteRcvr2, hej, true),
  234: 
  235:         ok
  236: 
  237:     after
  238: 	dbg:stop(),
  239:         peer:stop(Peer)
  240:     end.
  241: 
  242: send_test(Pid, Pattern, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  243:     {ok, [{matched, _, _}, _]} = dbg:tpe(send, Pattern),
  244:     send_test(Pid, Msg, TraceEvent).
  245: send_test(Pid, Pattern) ->
  246:     send_test(Pid, Pattern, make_ref(), true).
  247: send_test(Pid, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  248:     S = self(),
  249:     Pid ! {S, Msg},
  250:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  251:     send_test_rcv(Pid, Msg, S, TraceEvent).
  252: 
  253: remote_send_test(Pid, RPid, Pattern, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  254:     dbg:tpe(send, Pattern),
  255:     TMsg = {self(), Msg},
  256:     Pid ! {RPid, TMsg},
  257:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  258:     send_test_rcv(Pid, TMsg, RPid, TraceEvent).
  259: 
  260: send_test_rcv(Pid, Msg, S, TraceEvent) ->
  261:     case flush() of
  262:         [] when not TraceEvent ->
  263:             ok;
  264:         [{trace, Pid, send, Msg, S}] when TraceEvent ->
  265:             ok;
  266:         [{trace, Pid, send, Msg, S, Message}] when TraceEvent == Message ->
  267:             ok;
  268:         Else ->
  269:             ct:fail({got_unexpected_message, Else})
  270:     end.
  271: 
  272: recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  273:     {ok, _} = start(),
  274:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  275:     rpc:call(Node, code, add_patha,
  276:              [filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "..")]),
  277:     try
  278:         Echo = fun F() ->
  279:                        receive {From, M} ->
  280:                                From ! M,
  281:                                F()
  282:                        end
  283:                end,
  284: 	Rcvr = spawn_link(Echo),
  285:         RemoteRcvr = spawn(Node, Echo),
  286: 
  287: 	{ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(Rcvr, 'receive'),
  288: 
  289:         recv_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), true),
  290: 
  291:         %% Test that the test case process is the sending process
  292:         recv_test(Rcvr, [{[node(), self(), '_'],[],[]}]),
  293: 
  294:         %% Test that self() is the not sending process
  295:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}, {saved, 2}]} =
  296:             dbg:tpe('receive', [{[node(), '$1','_'],[{'==','$1',{self}}],[]}]),
  297:         recv_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), false),
  298: 
  299:         %% Test that self() is the receiving process
  300:         recv_test(Rcvr, [{'_',[{'==',Rcvr,{self}}],[]}]),
  301: 
  302:         %% Test attaching a message
  303:         recv_test(Rcvr, [{'_',[{'==',Rcvr,{self}}],[{message, hello}]}],
  304:                   make_ref(), hello),
  305: 
  306:         %% Test using a saved trace pattern
  307:         recv_test(Rcvr, 2, make_ref(), false),
  308: 
  309:         %% Test clearing of trace pattern
  310:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:ctpe('receive'),
  311:         recv_test(Rcvr, make_ref(), true),
  312: 
  313:         %% Test complex message inspection
  314:         Ref = make_ref(),
  315:         recv_test(Rcvr,
  316:                   [{[node(), '_','$2'],[{'==',Ref,{element,1,
  317:                                                    {element,2,
  318:                                                     {element,2,'$2'}}}}],[]}],
  319:                   {test, {Ref}, <<0:(8*1024)>>}, true),
  320: 
  321:         recv_test(Rcvr, {test, {make_ref()}, <<0:(8*1024)>>}, false),
  322: 
  323:         %% Test recv to remote process
  324:         remote_recv_test(RemoteRcvr, Rcvr, [], make_ref(), true),
  325: 
  326:         remote_recv_test(RemoteRcvr, Rcvr,
  327:                          [{['$1',undefined,'_'],[{'==','$1',{node}}],[]}],
  328:                          make_ref(), false),
  329: 
  330:         remote_recv_test(RemoteRcvr, Rcvr,
  331:                          [{['$1',undefined,'_'],[{'==','$1',Node}],[]}],
  332:                          make_ref(), true),
  333: 
  334:         %% Test that distributed dbg works
  335:         dbg:tracer(Node, process, {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  336:         Rcvr2 = spawn_link(Echo),
  337:         RemoteRcvr2 = spawn(Node, Echo),
  338:         dbg:p(Rcvr2, ['receive']),
  339:         dbg:p(RemoteRcvr2, ['receive']),
  340:         dbg:tpe('receive', [{[node(), '_', '$1'],[{'==',{element,2,'$1'}, hej}],[]}]),
  341: 
  342:         recv_test(Rcvr2, make_ref(), false),
  343:         recv_test(RemoteRcvr2, make_ref(), false),
  344:         recv_test(Rcvr2, hej, true),
  345:         recv_test(RemoteRcvr2, hej, true),
  346: 
  347:         ok
  348: 
  349:     after
  350: 	dbg:stop(),
  351:         peer:stop(Peer)
  352:     end.
  353: 
  354: recv_test(Pid, Pattern, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  355:     {ok, [{matched, _, _}, _]} = dbg:tpe('receive', Pattern),
  356:     recv_test(Pid, Msg, TraceEvent).
  357: recv_test(Pid, Pattern) ->
  358:     recv_test(Pid, Pattern, make_ref(), true).
  359: recv_test(Pid, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  360:     S = self(),
  361:     Pid ! {S, Msg},
  362:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  363:     recv_test_rcv(Pid, {S, Msg}, TraceEvent).
  364: 
  365: remote_recv_test(RPid, Pid, Pattern, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  366:     dbg:tpe('receive', Pattern),
  367:     TMsg = {self(), Msg},
  368:     RPid ! {Pid, TMsg},
  369:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  370:     recv_test_rcv(Pid, TMsg, TraceEvent).
  371: 
  372: recv_test_rcv(Pid, Msg, TraceEvent) ->
  373:     case flush() of
  374:         [] when not TraceEvent ->
  375:             ok;
  376:         [{trace, Pid, 'receive', Msg}] when TraceEvent ->
  377:             ok;
  378:         [{trace, Pid, 'receive', Msg, Message}] when TraceEvent == Message ->
  379:             ok;
  380:         Else ->
  381:             ct:fail({got_unexpected_message, Else})
  382:     end.
  383: 
  384: %% Simple test of distributed tracing
  385: distributed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     {ok, _} = start(),
  387:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  388:     try
  389:         RexPid = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [rex]),
  390:         RexPidList = pid_to_list(RexPid),
  391:         {ok, Node} = dbg:n(Node),
  392:         {ok, X} = dbg:p(all,call),
  393:         {value, {matched, Node, _}} = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, X),
  394:         {ok, Y} = dbg:p(RexPidList, s),
  395:         {value, {matched, Node, 1}} = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, Y),
  396:         {ok, Z} = dbg:tp(dbg,ltp,[]),
  397:         {value, {matched, Node, 1}} = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, Z),
  398:         dbg:cn(Node),
  399:         dbg:tp(dbg,ln,[]),
  400:         ok = rpc:block_call(Node, dbg, ltp, []),
  401:         ok = rpc:block_call(Node, dbg, ln, []),
  402:         ok = dbg:ln(),
  403:         S = self(),
  404:         {TraceSend, TraceCall} =
  405:         lists:partition(fun ({trace,RP,send,_,_}) when RP =:= RexPid -> true;
  406:                             (_) -> false end,
  407:                         flush()),
  408:         [_|_] = TraceSend,
  409:         [{trace,Pid,call,{dbg,ltp,[]}},
  410:          {trace,S,call,{dbg,ln,[]}}] = TraceCall,
  411:         Node = node(Pid),
  412:         %%
  413:         stop()
  414:     after
  415:         dbg:stop(),
  416:         peer:stop(Peer)
  417:     end,
  418:     ok.
  419: 
  420: 
  421: %% Tests tracing of local function calls.
  422: local_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     {ok, _} = start(),
  424:     try
  425:         S = self(),
  426:         %% Split "<X.Y.Z>" into {X, Y, Z}
  427:         "<"++L1 = L = pid_to_list(S),
  428:         NoDot = fun ($.) -> false; (_) -> true end,
  429:         {LX,"."++L2} = lists:splitwith(NoDot, L1),
  430:         {LY,"."++L3} = lists:splitwith(NoDot, L2),
  431:         ">"++L4 = lists:reverse(L3),
  432:         LZ = lists:reverse(L4),
  433:         X = 0 = list_to_integer(LX),
  434:         Y = list_to_integer(LY),
  435:         Z = list_to_integer(LZ),
  436:         XYZ = {X, Y, Z},
  437:         io:format("Self = ~w = ~w~n", [S,XYZ]),
  438:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(S,call),
  439:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(XYZ,call),
  440:         if Z =:= 0 ->
  441:                {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(Y,call);
  442:            true -> ok
  443:         end,
  444:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(L,call),
  445:         {ok, _} = dbg:tpl(?MODULE,not_exported,[]),
  446:         4 = not_exported(2),
  447:         [{trace,S,call,{?MODULE,not_exported,[2]}}] = flush(),
  448:         {ok, _} = dbg:tp(?MODULE,exported,[]),
  449:         4 = ?MODULE:exported(2),
  450:         [{trace,S,call,{?MODULE,exported,[2]}},
  451:          {trace,S,call,{?MODULE,not_exported,[2]}}] = flush(),
  452:         {ok, _} = dbg:ctpl(?MODULE),
  453:         4 = ?MODULE:exported(2),
  454:         [{trace,S,call,{?MODULE,exported,[2]}}] = flush(),
  455:         {ok, _} = dbg:tpl(?MODULE,not_exported,[]),
  456:         {ok, _} = dbg:ctp(?MODULE),
  457:         4 = ?MODULE:exported(2),
  458:         [] = flush(),
  459:         {ok, _} = dbg:tpl(?MODULE,not_exported,x),
  460:         catch ?MODULE:exported(x),
  461:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg_SUITE,not_exported,[x]}},
  462:          {trace,S,exception_from,
  463:           {dbg_SUITE,not_exported,1},
  464:           {error,badarith}}] = flush()
  465:     after
  466:         dbg:stop()
  467:     end,
  468:     ok.
  469: 
  470: %% Test that tracing on port works
  471: port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     try
  473:         S = self(),
  474:         start(),
  475:         TestFile = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),"port_test"),
  476:         Fun = dbg:trace_port(file, TestFile),
  477: 
  478:         %% Do a run to get rid of all extra port operations
  479:         port_close(Fun()),
  480: 
  481:         dbg:p(new,ports),
  482:         Port = Fun(),
  483:         port_close(Port),
  484:         stop(),
  485: 
  486:         TraceFileDrv = list_to_atom(lists:flatten(["trace_file_drv n ",TestFile])),
  487:         [{trace,Port,open,S,TraceFileDrv},
  488:          {trace,Port,getting_linked,S},
  489:          {trace,Port,closed,normal}] = flush()
  490:     after
  491:         dbg:stop()
  492:     end,
  493:     ok.
  494: 
  495: %% Tests saving of match_spec's.
  496: saved_patterns(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  497:     dbg:stop(),
  498:     {ok,[{saved,1}]} =
  499:     dbg:tp(dbg,ctp,1,[{'_',[],[{message, blahonga}]}]),
  500:     {ok,[{saved,2}]} =
  501:     dbg:tp(dbg,ctp,1,[{['_'],[],[{message, blahonga}]}]),
  502:     Privdir=proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  503:     file:make_dir(Privdir),
  504:     File = filename:join([Privdir, "blahonga.ms"]),
  505:     dbg:wtp(File),
  506:     dbg:stop(),
  507:     dbg:ctp('_','_','_'),
  508:     {ok, _} = start(),
  509:     try
  510:         dbg:rtp(File),
  511:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1},{saved,1}]} = dbg:tp(dbg,ltp,0,1),
  512:         {ok, [{matched, _, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  513:         dbg:ltp(),
  514:         S = self(),
  515:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]},blahonga}] = flush()
  516:     after
  517:         dbg:stop()
  518:     end,
  519:     ok.
  520: 
  521: 
  522: 
  523: not_exported(N) ->
  524:     N * 2.
  525: 
  526: exported(N) ->
  527:     not_exported(N).
  528: 
  529: %% Test tracing to IP port
  530: ip_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  531:     stop(),
  532:     Port = dbg:trace_port(ip, 0),
  533:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(port, Port),
  534:     try
  535:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  536:         {ok, X} = dbg:tp(dbg, ltp,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  537:         {value, {saved, _Saved}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  538:         {ok, Y} = dbg:tp(dbg, ln, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  539:         {value, {saved, _}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, Y),
  540:         ok = dbg:ltp(),
  541:         ok = dbg:ln(),
  542:         {ok, IpPort} = dbg:trace_port_control(get_listen_port),
  543:         io:format("IpPort = ~p~n", [IpPort]),
  544:         dbg:trace_client(ip, IpPort, {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  545:         S = self(),
  546:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]},S},
  547:          {trace,S,call,{dbg,ln,[]},hej}] = flush()
  548:     after
  549:         dbg:stop()
  550:     end,
  551:     ok.
  552: 
  553: 
  554: 
  555: %% Test that the dbg server does not hang if the tracer don't start (OTP-3592)
  556: ip_port_busy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  557:     stop(),
  558:     Tracer = dbg:trace_port(ip, 4745),
  559:     Port = Tracer(),
  560:     {error, Reason} = dbg:tracer(port, Tracer),
  561:     try
  562:         io:format("Error reason = ~p~n", [Reason]),
  563:         true = port_close(Port)
  564:     after
  565:         dbg:stop()
  566:     end,
  567:     ok.
  568: 
  569: %% Test tracing to file port (simple)
  570: file_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  571:     stop(),
  572:     FName = make_temp_name(Config),
  573:     Port = dbg:trace_port(file, FName),
  574:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(port, Port),
  575:     try
  576:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  577:         {ok, X} = dbg:tp(dbg, ltp,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  578:         {value, {saved, _Saved}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  579:         {ok, Y} = dbg:tp(dbg, ln, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  580:         {value, {saved, _}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, Y),
  581:         ok = dbg:ltp(),
  582:         ok = dbg:ln(),
  583:         stop(),
  584:         dbg:trace_client(file, FName, {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  585:         S = self(),
  586:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]},S},
  587:          {trace,S,call,{dbg,ln,[]},hej},
  588:          end_of_trace] = flush()
  589:     after
  590:         dbg:stop(),
  591:         file:delete(FName)
  592:     end,
  593:     ok.
  594: 
  595: %% Test tracing to file port with 'follow_file'
  596: file_port2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  597:     stop(),
  598:     FName = make_temp_name(Config),
  599:     %% Ok, lets try with flush and follow_file.
  600:     Port2 = dbg:trace_port(file, FName),
  601:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(port, Port2),
  602:     try
  603:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  604:         {ok, _} = dbg:tp(dbg, ltp,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  605:         {ok, _} = dbg:tp(dbg, ln, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  606:         ok = dbg:ltp(),
  607:         ok = dbg:flush_trace_port(),
  608:         dbg:trace_client(follow_file, FName,
  609:                          {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  610:         S = self(),
  611:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ltp,[]},S}] = flush(),
  612:         ok = dbg:ln(),
  613:         ok = dbg:flush_trace_port(),
  614:         receive after 1000 -> ok end, %% Polls every second...
  615:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,ln,[]},hej}] = flush(),
  616:         stop(),
  617:         [] = flush()
  618:     after
  619:         dbg:stop(),
  620:         file:delete(FName)
  621:     end,
  622:     ok.
  623: 
  624: %% Test tracing to file
  625: file_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     stop(),
  627:     FName = make_temp_name(Config),
  628:     %% Ok, lets try with flush and follow_file.
  629:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(file, FName),
  630:     try
  631:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  632:         {ok, _} = dbg:tp(dbg, ltp,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  633:         {ok, _} = dbg:tp(dbg, ln, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  634:         ok = dbg:ltp(),
  635:         timer:sleep(100),
  636:         {ok, LTP} = file:read_file(FName),
  637:         <<"dbg:ltp()",_/binary>> = string:find(LTP, "dbg:ltp() ("++pid_to_list(self())++")"),
  638:         ok = dbg:ln(),
  639:         timer:sleep(100),
  640:         {ok, LN} = file:read_file(FName),
  641:         <<"dbg:ln()",_/binary>> = string:find(LN, "dbg:ln() (hej)"),
  642:         stop()
  643:     after
  644:         dbg:stop(),
  645:         file:delete(FName)
  646:     end,
  647:     ok.
  648: 
  649: %% Test tracing to wrapping file port
  650: wrap_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  651:     Self = self(),
  652:     stop(),
  653:     FName = make_temp_name(Config),
  654:     FNameWildcard = FName ++ "*" ++ ".trace",
  655:     %% WrapSize=0 and WrapCnt=11 will force the trace to wrap after
  656:     %% every trace message, and to contain only the last 10 entries
  657:     %% after trace stop since the last file will be empty waiting
  658:     %% for its first trace message.
  659:     WrapSize = 0,
  660:     WrapCnt = 11,
  661:     WrapFilesSpec = {FName, wrap, ".trace", WrapSize, WrapCnt},
  662:     wrap_port_init(WrapFilesSpec),
  663:     %% The number of iterations, N, is tested to place wrap the log,
  664:     %% giving a gap in the filename sequence at index 3.
  665:     %% This should be a difficult case for
  666:     %% the trace_client file sorting functionality.
  667:     N = 7,
  668:     lists:foreach(
  669:       fun(Cnt) ->
  670:               ?MODULE:tracee1(Cnt),
  671:               ?MODULE:tracee2(Cnt)
  672:       end,
  673:       lists:seq(1, N)),
  674:     stop(),
  675:     try
  676:         Files1 = filelib:wildcard(FNameWildcard),
  677:         io:format("~p~n", [Files1]),
  678:         Tc1 = dbg:trace_client(file, WrapFilesSpec,
  679:                                {fun myhandler/2, {wait_for_go,Self}}),
  680:         Tref1 = erlang:monitor(process, Tc1),
  681:         Tc1 ! {go,Self},
  682:         [{'DOWN',Tref1,_,_,normal},
  683:          end_of_trace
  684:          |Result] = lists:reverse(flush()),
  685:         M = N - (WrapCnt-1) div 2,
  686:         M = wrap_port_result(Result, Self, N),
  687:         %%
  688:         %% Start a new wrap log with the same name to verify that
  689:         %% all files are cleared at wrap log start. Only produce
  690:         %% two trace messages to also place the gap at index 3,
  691:         %% so the trace log will be misinterpreted.
  692:         %%
  693:         wrap_port_init(WrapFilesSpec),
  694:         Files2 = filelib:wildcard(FNameWildcard),
  695:         io:format("~p~n", [Files2]),
  696:         -1 = ?MODULE:tracee1(-1),
  697:         -1 = ?MODULE:tracee2(-1),
  698:         stop(),
  699:         Files = filelib:wildcard(FNameWildcard),
  700:         io:format("~p~n", [Files]),
  701:         Tc2 = dbg:trace_client(file, WrapFilesSpec,
  702:                                {fun myhandler/2, {wait_for_go,Self}}),
  703:         Tref2 = erlang:monitor(process, Tc2),
  704:         Tc2 ! {go,Self},
  705:         [{trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,tracee1,[-1]},Self},
  706:          {trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,tracee2,[-1]},hej},
  707:          end_of_trace,
  708:          {'DOWN',Tref2,_,_,normal}] = flush(),
  709:         %%
  710:         lists:map(fun(F) -> file:delete(F) end, Files)
  711:     after
  712:         dbg:stop()
  713:     end,
  714:     ok.
  715: 
  716: wrap_port_init(WrapFilesSpec) ->
  717:     Port = dbg:trace_port(file, WrapFilesSpec),
  718:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(port, Port),
  719:     {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  720:     {ok, X} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, tracee1,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  721:     {value, {saved, _Saved}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  722:     {ok, Y} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, tracee2, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  723:     {value, {saved, _}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, Y),
  724:     ok.
  725: 
  726: tracee1(X) ->
  727:     X.
  728: 
  729: tracee2(X) ->
  730:     X.
  731: 
  732: wrap_port_result([], _S, M) ->
  733:     M;
  734: wrap_port_result([{trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee2, [M]}, hej},
  735:                   {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee1, [M]}, S} | Tail],
  736:                  S,
  737:                  M) ->
  738:     wrap_port_result(Tail, S, M-1).
  739: 
  740: 
  741: %% Test tracing to time limited wrapping file port
  742: wrap_port_time(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  743:     stop(),
  744:     FName = make_temp_name(Config),
  745:     %% WrapTime=2 and WrapCnt=4 will force the trace to wrap after
  746:     %% every 2 seconds, and to contain between 3*2 and 4*2 seconds
  747:     %% of trace entries.
  748:     WrapFilesSpec = {FName, wrap, ".trace", {time, 2000}, 4},
  749:     Port = dbg:trace_port(file, WrapFilesSpec),
  750:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(port, Port),
  751:     try
  752:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  753:         {ok, X} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, tracee1,[{'_',[],[{message, {self}}]}]),
  754:         {value, {saved, _Saved1}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  755:         {ok, Y} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, tracee2, [{'_',[],[{message, hej}]}]),
  756:         {value, {saved, _Saved2}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, Y),
  757:         %% The delays in the iterations places two trace messages in each
  758:         %% trace file, but the last which is empty waiting for its first
  759:         %% trace message. The number of iterations is chosen so that
  760:         %% one trace file has been wasted, and therefore the first pair
  761:         %% of trace messages.
  762:         lists:foreach(
  763:           fun(Cnt) ->
  764:                   receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  765:                   ?MODULE:tracee1(Cnt),
  766:                   ?MODULE:tracee2(Cnt),
  767:                   receive after 1100 -> ok end
  768:           end,
  769:           lists:seq(1, 4)),
  770:         stop(),
  771:         Files = filelib:wildcard(FName ++ "*" ++ ".trace"),
  772:         io:format("~p~n", [Files]),
  773:         dbg:trace_client(file, WrapFilesSpec, {fun myhandler/2, self()}),
  774:         S = self(),
  775:         [{trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee1, [2]}, S},
  776:          {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee2, [2]}, hej},
  777:          {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee1, [3]}, S},
  778:          {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee2, [3]}, hej},
  779:          {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee1, [4]}, S},
  780:          {trace, S, call, {?MODULE, tracee2, [4]}, hej},
  781:          end_of_trace] = flush(),
  782:         lists:map(fun(F) -> file:delete(F) end, Files)
  783:     after
  784:         dbg:stop()
  785:     end,
  786:     ok.
  787: 
  788: %% Test ordinary tracing combined with seq_trace
  789: with_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  790:     try
  791:         {ok, Server} = start(),
  792:         {ok, Tracer} = dbg:get_tracer(),
  793:         {ok, X} = dbg:tp(dbg, get_tracer, [{[],[],
  794:                                             [{set_seq_token, send, true}]}]),
  795:         {value, {saved, _}} = lists:keysearch(saved, 1, X),
  796:         {ok, [{matched, _node, 1}]} = dbg:p(self(),call),
  797:         seq_trace:set_system_tracer(Tracer),
  798:         dbg:get_tracer(),
  799:         receive
  800:         after 1 ->
  801:                   ok
  802:         end,
  803:         S = self(),
  804:         ThisNode = node(),
  805:         [{trace,S,call,{dbg,get_tracer,[]}},
  806:          {seq_trace,0,{send,_,S,Server,{S,{get_tracer,ThisNode}}}},
  807:          {seq_trace,0,{send,_,Server,S,{dbg,{ok,Tracer}}}}] =
  808:         flush()
  809:     after
  810:         dbg:stop()
  811:     end,
  812:     ok.
  813: 
  814: 
  815: %% Test that trace messages concerning a now dead process does not crash dbg.
  816: dead_suspend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  817:     start(),
  818:     try
  819:         survived = run_dead_suspend()
  820:     after
  821:         dbg:stop()
  822:     end.
  823: 
  824: run_dead_suspend() ->
  825:     dbg:p(new, call),
  826:     dbg:tp(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  827:     spawn(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  828:     spawn(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  829:     spawn(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  830:     spawn(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  831:     spawn(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  832:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  833:     case whereis(dbg) of
  834:         undefined ->
  835:             died;
  836:         _ ->
  837:             survived
  838:     end.
  839: 
  840: dummy() ->
  841:     ok.
  842: 
  843: %% Test that a tracer process does not ignore an exit signal message when it has
  844: %% received (but not handled) trace messages
  845: tracer_exit_on_stop(_) ->
  846:     %% Tracer blocks waiting for fun to complete so that the trace message and
  847:     %% the exit signal message from the dbg process are in its message queue.
  848:     Fun = fun() ->
  849:                   ?MODULE:dummy(),
  850:                   Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(self()),
  851:                   receive {trace_delivered, _, Ref} -> stop() end
  852:           end,
  853:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(process, {fun spawn_once_handler/2, {self(), Fun}}),
  854:     {ok, Tracer} = dbg:get_tracer(),
  855:     MRef = monitor(process, Tracer),
  856:     {ok, _} = dbg:p(self(), [call]),
  857:     {ok, _} = dbg:p(new, [call]),
  858:     {ok, _} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  859:     ?MODULE:dummy(),
  860:     receive {'DOWN', MRef, _, _, normal} -> ok end,
  861:     [{trace,_,call,{?MODULE, dummy,[]}},
  862:      {trace,_,call,{?MODULE, dummy,[]}}] = flush(),
  863:     ok.
  864: 
  865: spawn_once_handler(Event, {Pid, done} = State) ->
  866:     Pid ! Event,
  867:     State;
  868: spawn_once_handler(Event, {Pid, Fun}) ->
  869:     {_, Ref} = spawn_monitor(Fun),
  870:     receive
  871:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, _} ->
  872:             Pid ! Event,
  873:             {Pid, done}
  874:     end.
  875: 
  876: %% Test that erl_tracer modules work correctly
  877: erl_tracer(Config) ->
  878:     stop(),
  879: 
  880:     ok = load_nif(Config),
  881: 
  882:     Self = self(),
  883:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(module, {?MODULE, Self}),
  884:     {ok, {?MODULE, Self}} = dbg:get_tracer(),
  885:     {ok, _} = dbg:p(self(), [c, timestamp]),
  886:     {ok, _} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  887:     ok = ?MODULE:dummy(),
  888:     [{Self, call, Self, Self, {?MODULE, dummy, []}, #{}}] = flush(),
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: %% Test that distributed erl_tracer modules work
  892: distributed_erl_tracer(Config) ->
  893:     stop(),
  894: 
  895:     S = self(),
  896: 
  897:     ok = load_nif(Config),
  898: 
  899:     LNode = node(),
  900:     {ok, Peer, RNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
  901:     true = rpc:call(RNode, code, add_patha, [filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "..")]),
  902:     ok = rpc:call(RNode, ?MODULE, load_nif, [Config]),
  903: 
  904:     NifProxy = fun() ->
  905:                        register(nif_proxy, self()),
  906:                        receive M -> S ! M end
  907:                end,
  908: 
  909:     LNifProxy = spawn_link(LNode, NifProxy),
  910:     RNifProxy = spawn_link(RNode, NifProxy),
  911: 
  912:     TracerFun = fun() -> {?MODULE, whereis(nif_proxy)} end,
  913: 
  914:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(LNode, module, TracerFun),
  915:     {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(RNode, module, TracerFun),
  916: 
  917:     {ok, [{matched, _, _}, {matched, _, _}]} = dbg:p(all,c),
  918:     {ok, [_, _]} = dbg:tp(?MODULE, dummy, []),
  919: 
  920:     {ok, {?MODULE, LNifProxy}} = dbg:get_tracer(LNode),
  921:     {ok, {?MODULE, RNifProxy}} = dbg:get_tracer(RNode),
  922: 
  923:     LCall = spawn_link(LNode, fun() -> ?MODULE:dummy() end),
  924:     [{LCall, call, LNifProxy, LCall, {?MODULE, dummy, []}, #{}}] = flush(),
  925: 
  926:     RCall = spawn_link(RNode, fun() -> ?MODULE:dummy() end),
  927:     [{RCall, call, RNifProxy, RCall, {?MODULE, dummy, []}, #{}}] = flush(),
  928: 
  929:     peer:stop(Peer),
  930:     ok.
  931: 
  932: load_nif(Config) ->
  933:     SoFile = atom_to_list(?MODULE),
  934:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  935:     case erlang:load_nif(filename:join(DataDir, SoFile) , 0) of
  936:         {error, {reload, _}} ->
  937:             ok;
  938:         ok ->
  939:             ok
  940:     end.
  941: 
  942: enabled(_, _, _) ->
  943:     erlang:nif_error(nif_not_loaded).
  944: 
  945: trace(_, _, _, _, _) ->
  946:     erlang:nif_error(nif_not_loaded).
  947: 
  948: %%
  949: %% Support functions
  950: %%
  951: 
  952: myhandler(Message, {wait_for_go,Pid}) ->
  953:     receive
  954:         {go,Pid} ->
  955:             myhandler(Message, Pid)
  956:     end;
  957: myhandler(Message, Relay) ->
  958:     Relay ! Message,
  959:     case Message of
  960:         end_of_trace ->
  961:             ok;
  962:         _ ->
  963:             Relay
  964:     end.
  965: 
  966: flush() ->
  967:     flush([]).
  968: flush(Acc) ->
  969:     receive
  970:         X ->
  971:             flush(Acc ++ [X])
  972:     after 1000 ->
  973:               Acc
  974:     end.
  975: 
  976: start() ->
  977:     stop(),
  978:     dbg:tracer(process, {fun myhandler/2, self()}).
  979: 
  980: stop() ->
  981:     dbg:stop().
  982: 
  983: make_temp_name(Config) ->
  984:     {A,B,C} = erlang:timestamp(),
  985:     FTMP = atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ integer_to_list(A) ++ "-" ++
  986:     integer_to_list(B) ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(C),
  987:     filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), FTMP).
